bio: We will support video content creators for economy, biology, electronic and tech
contributionDescription:
We're launching a DAO to support creators producing impactful video content on beneficial electronics and significant projects in biolog, chemistry and DIY.

How It Works:
VRNouns holders can apply for funding through our platform to bring their ideas to life. Other VRNouns holders voted and dedicated to providing the financial support needed for innovative and educational videos.

contributionLinks.description: This is our VRNouns nft contract on optimsm-base network

recategorizeReason: NO, it is a project, not an individual, based on the description that involves activities such as launching a DAO and providing a platform for VRNouns holders.
